summary: Now you can craft linen wraps at the tanning rack.
descriptionHtml:
The linen wraps can be crafted at any tanning rack under the \"Misc\" category,with tundra cotton and a potion called \"material fixative\".

How to proceed:

The potion \"material fixative\" can be created  in  a cooking pot.
INGREDIENTS: 2 Deathbell and 1 Jazbay Grapes

Use together potion and tundra cotton at the tanning rack under the \"Misc\" category.

It\'s my first mod.

Please leave a comment or suggestion; it\'s always appreciated!

PS: check this mod created by wetsail  

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8772
author: Dubwise52
